about_the_game:
This token pack contains 28 tokens: This set covers a mix of demons and devils.

This token pack includes:

  • Arch Demon
  • Babau
  • Bone Devil
  • Demon Balor
  • Demon Bebelith
  • Demon Caster
  • 2 Demon Dretch
  • Demon Eridux Isuf
  • 2 Demon Fighter
  • Demon Glabrezu
  • Demon Hezrou
  • Demon Mezzoloth
  • Demon Nalfeshnee
  • Demon Retriever
  • Demon Succubus
  • Devil Chain Kyton
  • Devil Horned Cornugon
  • Devil Ice Gelugon
  • Devil Barbazu Bearded
  • Devil Barbed Hamatula
  • Devil Imp
  • 2 Devil Lemure
  • 2 Devil Paeliryon
  • Devil Pit Fiend

Fantasy Grounds Conversion: Doug Davison

Released on May 25, 2014. Designed for Fantasy Grounds version 3.0.10 and higher.

Requires: An active subscription or a one time purchase of a Fantasy Grounds Full or Ultimate license and any ruleset.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 1.6 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7x , 8x or 10x
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card recommended
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Requirements vary by the add-ons installed and the number of players connecting to your game.
